open browser go to https://www.google.com
                search python playwright documentation
generated_code:
"""
Auto-generated Playwright test with adaptive selectors
Browser: VISIBLE MODE for demonstration
"""

from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright, expect, TimeoutError as PWTimeoutError
import sys
import time


def find_element_adaptive(page, selectors, element_name="element"):
    """Try multiple selectors until one works"""
    for selector in selectors:
        try:
            elem = page.locator(selector).first
            elem.wait_for(state="visible", timeout=5000)
            print(f"   Found {element_name} using: {selector}")
            return elem
        except:
            continue
    raise Exception(f"Could not find {element_name} with any selector")


def handle_cookie_consent(page):
    """Handle common cookie consent popups"""
    consent_selectors = [
        "button:has-text(\"Accept all\")",
        "button:has-text(\"Accept\")",
        "button:has-text(\"I agree\")",
        "[id*=\"accept\"]",
        "[class*=\"accept\"]"
    ]
    for selector in consent_selectors:
        try:
            page.locator(selector).click(timeout=3000)
            print("   Accepted cookies")
            return True
        except:
            continue
    return False


def run_test():
    """Execute the test with error handling"""
    print(" Starting test execution in VISIBLE MODE...")
    
    with sync_playwright() as p:
        # Launch VISIBLE browser with slow motion
        browser = p.chromium.launch(
            headless=False,  # Visible for demo
            slow_mo=900       # Slow motion effect
        )
        context = browser.new_context(
            viewport={"width": 1280, "height": 720},
            user_agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36"
        )
        page = context.new_page()
        
        try:
            print("\n  Step 1: OPEN_BROWSER")
            try:
                print("   Opening https://www.google.com...")
                page.goto("https://www.google.com", wait_until="domcontentloaded", timeout=30000)
                page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded")
                time.sleep(2)  # Let page stabilize
                
                # Handle cookie consent
                handle_cookie_consent(page)
                
                print("   Page loaded")
            except Exception as step_error:
                print(f"    Step 1 error: {step_error}")
                page.screenshot(path="screenshots/error_step_{i}.png")
                raise
            
            print("\n  Step 2: SEARCH")
            try:
                print("   Searching for: python playwright documentation")
                
                # Click somewhere to activate page
                page.mouse.click(300, 300)
                time.sleep(1)
                
                # Detect site and use appropriate search
                current_url = page.url.lower()
                
                if "google." in current_url:
                    print("   Google search detected")
                    search_selectors = [
                        "textarea[name=\"q\"]",
                        "input[name=\"q\"]",
                        "input[type=\"search\"]"
                    ]
                    search_box = find_element_adaptive(page, search_selectors, "Google search box")
                    search_box.fill("python playwright documentation")
                    page.keyboard.press("Enter")
                
                elif "youtube.com" in current_url:
                    print("   YouTube search detected")
                    page.wait_for_selector("input[name=\"search_query\"]", timeout=30000)
                    page.click("input[name=\"search_query\"]")
                    page.fill("input[name=\"search_query\"]", "python playwright documentation")
                    page.keyboard.press("Enter")
                
                elif "amazon." in current_url:
                    print("   Amazon search detected")
                    amazon_selectors = [
                        "#twotabsearchtextbox",
                        "input[type=\"text\"][name=\"field-keywords\"]"
                    ]
                    search_box = find_element_adaptive(page, amazon_selectors, "Amazon search")
                    search_box.fill("python playwright documentation")
                    page.keyboard.press("Enter")
                
                else:
                    print("    Generic search - trying common selectors")
                    generic_selectors = [
                        "input[type=\"search\"]",
                        "input[name*=\"search\"]",
                        "input[placeholder*=\"Search\"]",
                        "[data-testid*=\"search\"]"
                    ]
                    search_box = find_element_adaptive(page, generic_selectors, "search box")
                    search_box.fill("python playwright documentation")
                    page.keyboard.press("Enter")
                
                page.wait_for_load_state("networkidle", timeout=15000)
                time.sleep(3)  # Let results load
                print("   Search completed")
            except Exception as step_error:
                print(f"    Step 2 error: {step_error}")
                page.screenshot(path="screenshots/error_step_{i}.png")
                raise
            
            print("\n All steps PASSED!")
            print(" Browser stays open for 20 seconds for inspection")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 0
            
        except AssertionError as e:
            print(f"\n Assertion failed: {e}")
            page.screenshot(path="screenshots/assertion_failed.png")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 1
            
        except PWTimeoutError as e:
            print(f"\n  Timeout: {e}")
            page.screenshot(path="screenshots/timeout_error.png")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 1
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"\n Test FAILED: {e}")
            page.screenshot(path="screenshots/test_error.png")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 1


if __name__ == "__main__":
    exit_code = run_test()
    sys.exit(exit_code)

execution.output: Live output shown in terminal (visible mode)
